Story :

The 18th year of life for 4 close friends. The first was branded bad by society, the second becomes an ex-convict, the third turns out to be a junky, and the girl friend of the fourth one was gang raped. The pain of life was so great for all four to tolerate, no one can tell for sure when and where the pains will end. Revenge is inevitable for them, the fuel already ignited, what&#039;s left was when to explode.
